meanings.sent1: She lived a wishless life, content with what she had.
meanings.sent2: The monk was wishless, finding peace in simplicity.
meanings.sent3: His wishless attitude made him the least stressed person in the office.
meanings.sent4: The desert landscape was wishless, devoid of any signs of life.
meanings.sent5: The wishless sky seemed to stretch on forever, untouched by human desires.

meanings.sent1: The cat lounged in the sun, wishless and carefree.
meanings.sent2: After achieving enlightenment, he felt wishless and content.
meanings.sent3: The wishless student surprised everyone by acing the exam without studying.
meanings.sent4: The wishless ocean reflected the calmness of the evening.
meanings.sent5: Her wishless demeanor made her a mystery to those around her.
